Everton are set to learn the extent of injuries suffered by three key players in a series of scans ahead of a crucial week for the club.

articles.title: Three England stars and 4 All Blacks confirmed in full Barbarians squad - RugbyPass
articles.description: The Barbarians have named a star-studded panel of players for their upcoming match with an All Blacks XV at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
articles.content:
